div.p: A.J.D. designed the study, made the figures and drafted the manuscript text, with all authors contributing to refining the final manuscript text. H.Y., A.P. and N.M. assisted with the GCM and reanalysis data. M.T., S.L.O., J.P.E. and G.D. assisted with the downscaling data. Correspondence and requests for materials should be addressed to A.J.D. (andrew.dowdy@bom.gov.au).
